data.name: Bless Unleashed - Ultimate Founder's Pack
data.detailed_description:
Purchase the [Ultimate Founder's Pack] to obtain exclusive items to start your journey in the world of Lumios! (Available limited time only)


[Ultimate Founder's Pack] includes:

  • Premium Bless Pass
    Unlock Bless Pass Season benefits and rewards.
    [Cannot be sold in the Marketplace]

  • Bless Pass Tier Upgrade Ticket x2
    Effect: Increases Bless Pass Tier by 4.
    [Cannot be sold in the Marketplace]

  • Founder's Pack Exclusive Title (Pyreborn)
    Acquire the title [Pyreborn]. The title is visible above the character's name.
    [Cannot be sold in the Marketplace]

  • Card: Elven Hat / Card: Elven Outfit
    Effect: Adds the [Elven Hat] and [Elven Outfit] to your Wardrobe, which is accessible through the main menu.
    [This costume can only be used as Signature item for costume fusion.]

  • Elven Weapon Appearance Chest
    Acquire the weapon appearances designated for each class. Elven weapon appearance is available for all the characters in the account when purchased. However, the weapon's appearance cannot be salvaged.
    [This costume can only be used as Signature item for costume fusion.]

    [Type of Weapon Appearance per Class.]
    Crusader: Elven One-handed Sword / Elven Shield
    Berserker: Elven Axe
    Ranger: Elven Bow
    Mage: Elven Staff
    Priest: Elven Staff

  • Card: Ironclad Rhino
    Acquire the mount, Irconclad Rhino. Stomp and roam around the vast open world of Bless Unleashed with this heavy-duty Rhino.
    [Cannot be sold in the Marketplace]

  • Card: Ivory Unicorn
    Acquire the mount, Ivory Unicorn. Ride around on this colorful and magnificent mount.
    [Cannot be sold in the Marketplace]

  • Card: Emote (Salute)
    Acquire the emote, [Salute]. Express yourself through this emote.

  • Card: Emote (Love)
    Acquire the emote, [Love]. Express yourself through this emote.

  • 6,000 Lumena
    Currency is used to purchase items and services available within the Lumena Shop. A variety of items such as cosmetics and services are offered in the Lumena Shop.

  • 300,000 Star Seed
    In-game currency used in the Marketplace. Star Seeds can be acquired from numerous contents along with the Star Seed Exchange, where you can exchange your hard-earned gold for Star Seeds. The exchange is limited per day. Star seeds can also be used in Teleposts, Resurrect from battles, and much more

  • Premium Benefits (90 Days)
    This service offers a variety of in-game buffs and perks.

    [Premium Benefits]
    Gain +50 Lumena Every Day
    Increases the capacity of your bag +50
    Increases PvE XP Gain +50%
    Increases PvE Gold Gain +10%
    Increases Quest SXP Gain +10%
    Increases HP Recovery at Soul Pyres +300%
    Reduces Gathering/Mining/Logging Time -25%
    Increases All Crafting XP Gain +10%
    5% Marketplace Fee Discount
    40% General Goods Merchant Recovery Potion Purchase Price Discount

    Note: Daily Lumena can be received through daily login and added directly to the Lumena balance.
    Daily Lumena from Premium Benefits refreshes at 00:00 UTC.
    Premium Benefit's effects and durations are updated/applied when logging back to the game server or visiting the Lumena Shop.

  • Telepost Discount Ticket (30 Days)
    Effect: Reduces Telepost costs -30% for 30 days.

  • Basic Star Seed 20% Booster (30 Days)
    Improves Star Seed Exchange Rate +20%. Star Seeds can be acquired from numerous contents along with the Star Seed Exchange, where you can exchange your hard-earned gold for Star Seeds. The exchange is limited per day. Star seeds can also be used in Teleposts, Resurrect from battles, and much more.
    [Cannot be sold in the Marketplace]

  • Advanced Star Seed 40% Booster (30 Days)
    Improves Star Seed exchange rate +40%. Star Seeds can be acquired from numerous contents along with the Star Seed Exchange, where you can exchange your hard-earned gold for Star Seeds. The exchange is limited per day. Star seeds can also be used in Teleposts, Resurrect from battles, and much more. Also stacks with Basic Star Seed 20% Booster for a combined boost of 60%.
    [Cannot be sold in the Marketplace]

  • Gold Boost Ticket (30 Days)
    Increases Gold Gain from killing PvE enemies +50%

  • Bag Expansion Ticket ×10
    Increases your bag's maximum capacity by 1. To collect various items and materials, expanding the bag's inventory is a must.
    [Cannot be sold in the Marketplace]

  • Personal Storage Expansion Ticket ×5
    Increases Personal Storage capacity +1.
    [Cannot be sold in the Marketplace]

  • Account Storage Expansion Ticket ×5
    Increases Account Storage slots by 1.
    [Cannot be sold in the Marketplace]

  • Steam's refund policy applies to purchases made with Steam Wallet.
  • Purchased products can be collected through the Premium Inventory available in the Lumena Shop or Character Inventory
    (Premium Benefits effects are applied immediately when connected to the game.)
  • The actual product may vary from the product image shown.
  • Please contact customer support for inquiries regarding product purchases.

data.short_description: Purchase the [Ultimate Founder's Pack] to obtain exclusive items to start your journey in the world of Lumios! (Available limited time only)
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese, French, German, Korean, Japanese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB / AMD Radeon R7 370 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB / AMD Radeon RX 580 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

Bless Unleashed is a trademark of NEOWIZ. and may be registered in the Republic of Korea and other countries. All other marks and trademarks are the property of their respective owners. All rights reserved.
